categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Shortly after Kyle Katarn assumed the power of the Valley of the Jedi and became Galactic Emperor around 5 ABY, the Rebel Alliance initiated an uprising against him on Danuta. Emperor Katarn sent Sariss to crush the rebellion.
The uprising is mentioned only in the non-canon dark side alternative ending of the game Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II.
